# DNS Server Select Configuration Test Fixture (REQ-1)
# Tests multiple DNS server select entries with various options:
# - Multiple servers per entry
# - EDNS option
# - Record types (a, aaaa)
# - Query patterns including "." (all domains)
# - Original sender restriction (IP/CIDR)

# Basic entry with two DNS servers for all domains
dns server select 500000 1.1.1.1 1.0.0.1 .

# Entry with EDNS enabled and AAAA record type for all domains
dns server select 500100 2606:4700:4700::1111 edns=on aaaa .

# Entry with two servers, EDNS, type A, domain pattern and original sender restriction
dns server select 500200 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 edns=on a *.google.com 192.168.1.0/24

# Entry with single server and restrict pp option
dns server select 500300 208.67.222.222 *.opendns.com restrict pp 1

# Entry with IPv6 servers and MX record type
dns server select 500400 2001:4860:4860::8888 2001:4860:4860::8844 mx *.gmail.com

# Entry with PTR record type for reverse DNS
dns server select 500500 192.168.1.53 ptr *.168.192.in-addr.arpa

# Entry with NS record type
dns server select 500600 10.0.0.53 ns *.internal.example.com

# Entry with CNAME record type
dns server select 500700 10.0.0.54 cname *.cdn.example.com

# Entry with ANY record type (all record types)
dns server select 500800 10.0.0.55 edns=on any *.example.org

# Entry with IP range original sender
dns server select 500900 172.16.0.53 . 10.0.0.1-10.0.0.254

# Other DNS configuration for context
dns service on
dns domain lookup on
dns domain example.local
dns server 192.168.1.1 192.168.1.2
dns static router.local 192.168.1.1
dns private address spoof on
